tool_description: Rewrite text with our machine learning based technology. After sign-up you can use http://textrewrite.com/tool
title: TextRewrite.com

api_list.name: Rewrite Text (GET for short texts)
api_list.description: Just insert your text and have it rewritten instantly.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: A great day to give this API a try.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Text format (optional). Can be `text` or `html`. Default is `text`.
